title: Pilot
synopsis: Unassuming high school chemistry teacher Walter White discovers he has lung cancer. Desperate to secure his family's financial future and finally free from the fear that had always inhibited him, Walt teams up with a former student to turn a used RV into a mobile drug lab.

title: Cat's in the Bag...
synopsis: Walt and Jesse attempt to tie up loose ends. Skyler becomes suspicious of Walt's strange behavior.

title: ...and the Bag's in the River
synopsis: Walt and Jesse clean up Emilio's mess and Walt must face holding up his end of the deal.

title: Cancer Man
synopsis: Walt reveals his cancer at a family barbecue. Jesse goes to visit his family.

title: Gray Matter
synopsis: Walt and Skyler attend the birthday party of an affluent former colleague. Jesse attempts to go straight.

title: Crazy Handful of Nothin'
synopsis: Walt is plagued by the effects of chemotherapy. Skinny Pete makes an introduction and Walt strikes a deal.

title: A No-Rough-Stuff-Type Deal
synopsis: Walt gets comfortable with his new identity. Marie gives Skyler a questionable baby shower gift.

title: Seven Thirty-Seven
synopsis: Walt and Jesse are reminded of Tuco’s volatile nature, and try to figure a way out of their partnership.

title: Grilled
synopsis: Walt and Jesse find themselves in close quarters with an unhinged Tuco. Skyler is distraught over Walt’s disappearance.

title: Bit by a Dead Bee
synopsis: Walt and Jesse cover their tracks. Hank gets a break in his meth investigation.

title: Down
synopsis: Walt tries to reconnect with his family, but Skyler keeps her distance. Jesse finds himself homeless.

title: Breakage
synopsis: Tensions and bills mount at the White house. Hank suffers from his encounter with Tuco. Jesse assembles a crew.

title: Peekaboo
synopsis: Walt returns to work. Skinny Pete gets ripped off and when Jesse steps in, he gets more than he bargained for.

title: Negro y Azul
synopsis: Hank struggles in El Paso. Skyler pursues a new job. Jesse gets to know Jane.

title: Better Call Saul
synopsis: When Badger gets busted, Walt and Jesse seek the legal advice of a shady attorney, Saul Goodman.

title: 4 Days Out
synopsis: The Whites await news about Walt's cancer treatment progress. Walt and Jesse retreat to the desert for a marathon cook.

title: Over
synopsis: Walt and Hank get into a fight, and Walt consumes himself with home improvements. Skyler opens up to her boss, Ted.

title: Mandala
synopsis: Saul proposes a new business partner. Skyler makes a disturbing discovery. Jesse divulges his real profession to Jane.

title: Phoenix
synopsis: Walter, Jr. launches a website to aid his struggling family. Jesse's addiction spirals out of control.

title: ABQ
synopsis: Skyler and Walt collide. Jesse self-destructs after a personal blow. Donald's grief leads to tragedy.

title: No Más
synopsis: Walt deals with the plane crash and Skyler's anger as Jesse comes to a realization. A new threat appears.

title: Caballo Sin Nombre
synopsis: Walt takes drastic action to bring his family back together. With Saul's help, Jesse makes an unexpected investment.

title: I.F.T.
synopsis: Walt ignores Skyler's demands, pushing her to break bad. Hank crosses a line at work.

title: Green Light
synopsis: Walt loses control. Hank throws himself into his blue meth investigation. Jesse enacts a new plan.

title: Más
synopsis: Gus lures Walt back into business, forcing a rift between Walt and Jesse. Skyler doubts her new relationship.

title: Sunset
synopsis: Walt settles into his new surroundings. Hank's investigation creates an immediate problem for Walt and Jesse.

title: One Minute
synopsis: Hank's volatility forces a confrontation with Jesse and trouble at work. Skyler pressures Walt to make a deal.

title: I See You
synopsis: The family waits for news about Hank. While Jesse covers at the lab, Walt attempts to placate Gus.

title: Kafkaesque
synopsis: As Hank's hospital bills mount, Skyler hatches a plan. Walt and Gus come to a better understanding.

title: Fly
synopsis: Walt becomes obsessed with a contaminant in the lab. A frustrated Jesse attempts to get Walt back on track.

title: Abiquiú
synopsis: Skyler gets involved in Walt's business. Hank struggles with recovery. Jesse makes a startling discovery.

title: Half Measures
synopsis: Jesse lashes out. Fearing for Jesse's safety, Walt intervenes. A tragic event leads to a shocking confrontation.

title: Full Measure
synopsis: With Jesse on the run, Walt bargains with Gus and concocts a plan to provide for his and Jesse's safety.

title: Box Cutter
synopsis: Walt and Jesse face the deadly consequences of their actions. Skyler deals with a puzzling disappearance, as Marie struggles to help Hank with his recovery.

title: Thirty-Eight Snub
synopsis: Walt attempts to form a new alliance as he plans his next move. Skyler pushes Walt towards a business opportunity, in hopes of protecting the family.

title: Open House
synopsis: Events spiral out of control at Jesse’s place. Skyler reluctantly asks for Saul’s help. Marie returns to an old pastime and a friend asks Hank for help.

title: Bullet Points
synopsis: The Cartel takes steps to gain the upper hand. Walt and Skyler share an embarrassing secret with the rest of the family. Jesse's activities draw unwanted attention.

title: Shotgun
synopsis: When Jesse goes missing, Walt fears the worst. Skyler has an unlikely reunion. Hank shares some bad news with Detective Tim Roberts.

title: Cornered
synopsis: Skyler makes an unsettling discovery. Walter, Jr. pushes his dad into a questionable purchase. Jesse offers Mike some unexpected help.

title: Problem Dog
synopsis: A frustrated Walt gambles on a risky new plan. Skyler's business venture hits a snag. Hank recruits Walter, Jr. for an unusual outing.

title: Hermanos
synopsis: Skyler develops an unusual solution to her money troubles. Hank enlists Walt to investigate a theory. Walt’s impatience with Jesse grows.

title: Bug
synopsis: Skyler's past mistakes come back to haunt her. Gus takes action to thwart his rivals. Jesse seeks Walt's help, with mixed results.

title: Salud
synopsis: Walt's family worries when he doesn't turn up for Walter, Jr.'s 16th birthday. Jesse is forced to put his lab skills to the test without Mr. White's help.

title: Crawl Space
synopsis: Walt takes drastic action to protect his secret and Gus. Skyler's efforts to solve Ted's financial problems hit a wall.

title: End Times
synopsis: Hank pushes Gomez to pursue one last lead, while Walt struggles to protect the family. Jesse gets alarming news and rushes to meet with Mr. White.

title: Face Off
synopsis: Walt and Jesse team up to take on Gus. With Saul’s help, Walt finds an unexpected ally.

title: Live Free of Die
synopsis: As Walt deals with the aftermath of the Casa Tranquila explosion, Hank works to wrap up his investigation of Gus' empire.

title: Madrigal
synopsis: Walt and Jesse seek out an unlikely partner for a new business venture. The DEA follows up new leads in its investigation.

title: Hazard Pay
synopsis: Walt and Jesse put a business plan into action. Walt confesses a secret to Marie.

title: Fifty-One
synopsis: Walt celebrates another birthday. Skyler considers her options. An associate complicates Walt and Jesse's plan.

title: Dead Freight
synopsis: Walt's team must get creative to obtain the materials they need to continue their operation.

title: Buyout
synopsis: Walt, Jesse, and Mike struggle over the future of their business, as occupational hazards weigh on Jesse.

title: Say My Name
synopsis: https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/breakingbad/images/b/bc/BB_507_S.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170418200824

title: Gliding Over All
synopsis: Walt ties up loose ends. Seeing the evidence of his success, he makes a startling and dangerous decision.

title: Blood Money
synopsis: As Walt and Jesse adjust to life out of the business, Hank grapples with a troubling lead.

title: Buried
synopsis: While Skyler's past catches up with her, Walt covers his tracks. Jesse continues to struggle with his guilt.

title: Confessions
synopsis: Jesse decides to make a change, while Walt and Skyler try to deal with an unexpected demand.

title: Rabid Dog
synopsis: An unusual strategy starts to bear fruit, while plans are set in motion that could change everything.

title: To'hajilee
synopsis: Things heat up for Walt in unexpected ways.

title: Ozymandias
synopsis: Everyone copes with radically changed circumstances.

title: Granite State
synopsis: Events set in motion long ago move toward a conclusion.

title: Felina
synopsis: The series finale.

title: Uno
synopsis: Jimmy works his magic in the courtroom. Unexpected inspiration leads him to an unconventional pursuit of potential clients.

title: Mijo
synopsis: As his troubles escalate to a boiling point, Jimmy finds himself in dire straits. An act of carelessness puts Chuck at risk.

title: Nacho
synopsis: Jimmy pulls out all the stops to prove that his dangerous client is innocent, even though it causes some friction with Kim.

title: Hero
synopsis: Jimmy conjures up a bold plan to solicit new clients, but has to face the consequences when the scheme strains his relationships with a rival firm.

title: Alpine Shepherd Boy
synopsis: When his efforts to drum up new business are interrupted by alarming news, Jimmy is pressured to make a difficult choice.

title: Five-O
synopsis: Mike's tragic past comes back to haunt him, and he's forced to seek help from an unusual source. Jimmy's moral compass is put to the test.

title: Bingo
synopsis: Jimmy meets with potential new clients. When given the opportunity to do the right thing, Jimmy cashes in a favor from an unlikely ally.

title: RICO
synopsis: Jimmy demonstrates to Chuck that he's willing to do almost anything to win a case, even if it means getting his hands dirty.

title: Pimento
synopsis: Chuck urges Jimmy to accept a harsh truth. A deal threatens to go off the rails when Mike's ability to complete a job is called into question.

title: Marco
synopsis: In the aftermath of recent events, Jimmy seizes an opportunity to reconnect with an old friend. Chuck adjusts to a new way of life.

title: Switch
synopsis: Jimmy and Kim's relationship takes a new turn. Mike decides it's for the best to sever his affiliation with an unrestrained associate.

title: Cobbler
synopsis: To keep a potentially messy situation from unraveling, Mike brokers a deal. Jimmy works to exonerate an eccentric client.

title: Amarillo
synopsis: Jimmy's client outreach efforts thrive, and he exhibits new heights of showmanship. Mike is perplexed by daughter-in-law Stacey's troubling news.

title: Gloves Off
synopsis: Jimmy's actions unexpectedly create waves for Kim. Mike cautiously weighs a lucrative proposal that might bring about dire consequences.

title: Rebecca
synopsis: Jimmy becomes frustrated with his restrictive work environment. Kim pulls out all the stops to dig herself out of a seemingly bottomless hole at HHM.

title: Bali Ha'i
synopsis: Jimmy finds comfort in a familiar place. Kim receives a life-changing proposal. Mike is pushed to the limit when what he holds dearest is threatened.

title: Inflatable
synopsis: Mike's growing frustration shows when his hand is forced. With Jimmy's help, he works to keep the peace. Jimmy boldly forges a new path forward.

title: Fifi
synopsis: Mike is determined to settle the score with a dangerous adversary. An unexpected opportunity to gain a competitive edge falls in Jimmy's lap.

title: Nailed
synopsis: Mike takes a methodical approach to his mission. Someone questions Chuck's capabilities. Jimmy faces a personal dilemma.

title: Klick
synopsis: Jimmy is forced to make a hard choice. Mike takes matters into his own hands. Hamlin relays shocking news while Chuck's condition continues to evolve.

title: Mabel
synopsis: Jimmy and Chuck's relationship deteriorates. Kim feels the pressure of running her own firm. Mike investigates the note left on his car.

title: Witness
synopsis: Jimmy and Kim hire an assistant. Mike seeks out a mysterious acquaintance. Chuck uses the law to gain an advantage over Jimmy.

title: Sunk Costs
synopsis: Jimmy decides to represent a new client, much to Kim's dismay. Mike meets a formidable ally who presents an enticing offer.

title: Sabrosito
synopsis: Jimmy calls in a favor from Mike. New complications disrupt the Salamancas' business. Chuck and Jimmy struggle to compromise.

title: Chicanery
synopsis: Kim and Jimmy face off with an adversary; Jimmy looks to Chuck's past to secure his future; Jimmy loses an ally and gains another.

title: Off Brand
synopsis: Jimmy has a new endeavor; Chuck pushes himself to the limit; Nacho finds himself in a power struggle.

title: Expenses
synopsis: Jimmy tries to settle debts; Nacho reunites with an acquaintance; Mike helps Stacey with a project and makes a connection.

title: Slip
synopsis: Jimmy is pushed to desperate measures; Nacho picks up a skill; Mike explores an alliance; Kim stands up to Hamlin.

title: Fall
synopsis: Jimmy visits a friend and takes up an old pastime; Chuck and Hamlin argue over the future of the firm; Kim faces challenges.

title: Lantern
synopsis: Kim takes time off; Jimmy tries to make amends; Nacho gambles with his future; Hamlin pushes Chuck to make a decision.

title: Smoke
synopsis: Jimmy struggles to cope with Chuck's tragic death. Mike ponders his role at Madrigal. Howard makes a startling confession.

title: Breathe
synopsis: Jimmy seeks new employment. Gus navigates the fallout from Hector's collapse. Kim endeavors to support Jimmy in the wake of Chuck's death.

title: Something Beautiful
synopsis: Jimmy puts a risky plan into motion. As alliances shift, Nacho finds himself in the crosshairs. Kim contemplates her future.

title: Talk
synopsis: A restless Jimmy embarks on a new endeavor while Mike burns bridges. Kim pursues her bliss. Nacho tries to survive a turf war.

title: Quite a Ride
synopsis: Jimmy identifies a new market for his talents; Mike vets a potential partnership; Kim drives a hard bargain.

title: Pinata
synopsis: While Jimmy daydreams about reconstituting Wexler-McGill, Kim sets out to secure her own future; Mike puts a plan into motion for Gus.

title: Something Stupid
synopsis: Jimmy expands his business, but runs into a problem that only Kim can solve. Gus intervenes in Hector's medical care. Mike deals with a setback.

title: Coushatta
synopsis: Jimmy goes to great lengths to right a wrong, as Kim pulls out all the stops for a case; Mike lets his team blow off steam; Nacho receives a visitor.

title: Wiedersehen
synopsis: Jimmy and Kim unburden themselves, risking their relationship in the process; Nacho is forced to make the rounds with Lalo; Mike has cause to worry.

title: Winner
synopsis: Jimmy turns the page on his reputation; Lalo tracks a loose end in Gus' operation; Mike is forced to make a difficult decision.

title: El Camino: A Breaking Bad Movie
synopsis: Jesse Pinkman pursues freedom after escaping from Jack Welker's Gang.

title: Magic Man
synopsis: Now doing business as Saul Goodman, Jimmy unveils an unorthodox strategy for client development that tests Kim’s tolerance of his new legal persona. Lalo searches for the mysterious Michael, only to discover a problem within his own operation.

title: 50% Off
synopsis: Jimmy’s promotional stunt has unintended consequences. Nacho takes extreme measures to earn Lalo’s trust. Saul is a success at the courthouse, but still has yet to win Kim over. Simmering with rage and self-loathing, Mike loses his temper.

title: The Guy For This
synopsis: Jimmy’s business enters uncharted territory. Kim’s confidence is tested when she’s faced with a legal problem only she can solve. Nacho navigates increased pressure from Gus. Mike continues to spiral.

title: Namaste
synopsis: As Jimmy doubles down on Saul Goodman, a deeply conflicted Kim brings him an interesting proposition. Gus makes a sacrifice in order to play the long game. Mike attempts to smooth things over with his family.

title: Dedicado a Max
synopsis: Mike takes an impromptu trip out of town. As she and Jimmy grow closer over their campaign to help a client, Kim makes a surprising call.

title: Wexler v. Goodman
synopsis: Kim tries to pump the brakes on Jimmy’s latest scheme, but it may be too late to stop Saul. Mike turns the heat up on Lalo. Nacho attempts to enlist support from above.

title: JMM
synopsis: Jimmy and Kim build a legal firewall with help from Huell. Kim sets things straight with her clients as Jimmy is compromised by his. Gus, at war on all fronts, calms troubled waters in service of his plot to build an empire. Mike does damage control.

title: Bagman
synopsis: When a simple errand for a client goes sideways, Jimmy is pushed to the limit. Mike takes measures to contain the wrath of the cartel, and Lalo gets an unexpected visitor.

title: Bad Choice Road
synopsis: In the wake of Jimmy’s traumatic misadventure, Kim takes stock of what is important. Jimmy attempts to return to business as usual, but it’s more difficult than anticipated. Gus and Mike set a plan in motion.

title: Something Unforgivable
synopsis: Jimmy and Kim make a sideways move that takes a serious turn. Nacho gets closer to the cartel than he’d like.

title: Wine and Roses
synopsis: Nacho runs for his life. Jimmy and Kim hatch a plan. Mike questions his allegiances.

title: Carrot and Stick
synopsis: Harsh realities dawn on Nacho. Gus investigates his suspicions.

title: Rock and Hard Place
synopsis: Still on the run, Nacho is forced to choose where his loyalties lie. Jimmy must decide whether he wants to remain a "friend of the cartel" after his reputation is called into question. Gus and Mike ready the team for a meeting.

title: Hit and Run
synopsis: Despite assurances from the cartel, Gus takes extreme measures to protect himself against looming threats. Kim and Jimmy enlist the help of a local pro to put on a show for Clifford Main. Howard seeks outside counsel.

title: Black and Blue
synopsis: While business booms for Jimmy, the vise tightens on the cat-and-mouse game between Gus and Lalo.

title: Axe and Grind
synopsis: Kim and Jimmy enlist a knowledgeable contact; Howard scrutinizes Jimmy's business practices.

title: Plan and Execution
synopsis: https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/breakingbad/images/1/13/BCS_607_Plan_and_Execution.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20220801174053

title: Point and Shoot
synopsis: An unexpected visitor forces Jimmy and Kim to face the consequences of their actions.

title: Fun and Games
synopsis: Gus attempts to smooth things over with the cartel while Mike ties up loose ends.

title: Nippy
synopsis: A lost dog leads to a new friend. A new player gets in the game.

title: Breaking Bad
synopsis: Emboldened by recent successes, partners throw caution to the wind and escalate their enterprise to new levels.

title: Waterworks
synopsis: The stakes are raised when a discovery is made that will send shockwaves far and wide.

title: Saul Gone
synopsis: The series finale.
